definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: si vera l. bear, carry a load (v. BH);—

definitions.title: Pō‘.
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[אֻשּׁׂ֫הִי מְסוֹבְלִים]] (K:§ 36 Nö:GGA, 1884, 1016) Ezr 6:3 its foundations (be) raised (Thes al.; W:CG 203, 225), very dub.; Hpt:Gu ad loc. conj. ´[[מְס]] :´[[אֶשּׁׂהִ]]: his (God’s) fire-offerings they bring (As. Zabâlu), so (hesitantly) Berthol.
